title: A Little Life
description: A novelette of an ultimate loss. 8800 words, DRM free.  She lost her only child and didn't know how she would go on until he began to appear to her. What he asked her to do, however, was impossible. His demands grew stronger, leaving her but two choices. Go with him or stay with her husband to begin a new family.  Then he changed. Who was this ghost child who haunted her? Would she never be free?
author: Billie Sue Mosiman
